languages.text: Паскаль — оперативник, как и Идира, но он также принадлежит к братству техножрецов, что дает ему дополнительные возможности, преимущества и уникальные навыки. Паскаль имеет мехадендрит, который позволяет ему одновременно держать в руках двуручный топор техножреца и дополнительное дистанционное оружие — экипируйте его в мехадендрит через окно инвентаря [{bind|OpenInventory}]. Связь с машинным духом — особая способность Паскаля, снижающая отдачу и повышающая снижение уклонения оружия всех союзников в области. Все враги в этой же области получат противоположные эффекты. Изгнание машинного духа — особая способность Паскаля, которая на 1 раунд снижает урон, наносимый атаками выбранной цели. Цели со свойством Отбрось плоть получают электрический урон. Если цель — механизм или машина, эти повреждения удваиваются, а ее характеристики понижаются до конца боя.

Pasqal is an Operative like Idira, but he is also a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}fellowship{/g} of Tech-Priests, which grants him additional options, advantages, and unique capabilities. One of Pasqal's mechadendrites allows him to hold his two-handed Tech-Priest's axe and a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon at the same time. Equip a second weapon in his mechadendrite slot on the inventory screen [{bind|OpenInventory}]. Machine Spirit Communion is Pasqal's special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} which reduces {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} and boosts {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} of allies' weapons in an area. All enemies in the same area will suffer opposite effects. Machine Spirit Banishment is one of Pasqal's special abilities, which reduces the damage dealt by the target's attacks for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Targets with the Reject the Flesh feature suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g}. If the target is a mechanism or a machine, this damage is doubled and its characteristics are reduced until the end of combat.
languages.original_text: Паскаль — адепт, как и Идира, но он также принадлежит к братству техножрецов, что даёт ему дополнительные возможности, преимущества и уникальные навыки. Паскаль имеет мехадендрит, который позволяет ему одновременно держать в руках двуручный топор техножреца и дополнительное дальнобойное оружие — экипируйте его в мехадендрит через окно инвентаря [{bind|OpenInventory}]. Связь с машинным духом — особая способность Паскаля, снижающая отдачу и повышающая снижение уклонения оружия всех союзников в области. Все враги в этой же области получат противоположные эффекты. Изгнание машинного духа — особая способность Паскаля, которая на 1 раунд снижает урон, наносимый атаками выбранной цели. Цели со свойством Отбрось плоть получают электрический урон. Если цель — механизм или машина, эти повреждения удваиваются, а ее характеристики понижаются до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: Pasqal is an Adept like Idira, but he is also a member of the fellowship of Tech-Priests, which grants him additional options, advantages, and unique capabilities. One of Pasqal's mechadendrites allows him to hold his two-handed Tech-Priest's axe and a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon at the same time. Equip a second weapon in his mechadendrite slot on the inventory screen [{bind|OpenInventory}]. Machine Spirit Communication is Pasqal's special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} which reduces the {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} and boosts the {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} of allies' weapons in an area. All enemies in the same area will suffer opposite effects. Machine Spirit Banishment is one of Pasqal's special abilities, which reduces the damage dealt by the target's attacks for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Targets with the Reject the Flesh feature suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g}. If the target is a mechanism or a machine, this damage is doubled and its characteristics are reduced until the end of combat.

Machine Spirit Banishment is one of Pasqal's special abilities, which reduces the damage dealt by the target's attacks for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. languages.text: 帕斯卡与和伊迪拉都是特工，但除此之外，帕斯卡还是一位技术神甫。正因如此，他拥有更多选择、优势与独一无二的能力。{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}{/g} 帕斯卡的其中一条机械触须可以让他同时手持技术神甫的双手能量斧与一把{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}武器。您可以在物品栏[{bind|OpenInventory}]界面中，将第二把武器装备到他的机械触须栏位。 机魂交流是帕斯卡的特殊{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，可以减少区域内所有盟友武器的{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}后坐力{/g}，提高武器的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}。同一区域内的所有敌人都会受到相反效果影响。 机魂放逐是帕斯卡的特殊能力，可降低目标所有攻击造成的伤害，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。如果目标具有拒绝实肉特性，此能力还会造成{g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}电击伤害{/g}。如果目标是机械装置或机器，此能力会造成双倍伤害，还会降低目标所有属性，效果持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Pasqal is an Operative like Idira, but he is also a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}fellowship{/g} of Tech-Priests, which grants him additional options, advantages, and unique capabilities. One of Pasqal's mechadendrites allows him to hold his two-handed Tech-Priest's axe and a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon at the same time. Equip a second weapon in his mechadendrite slot on the inventory screen [{bind|OpenInventory}]. Machine Spirit Communion is Pasqal's special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} which reduces {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} and boosts {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} of allies' weapons in an area. All enemies in the same area will suffer opposite effects. Machine Spirit Banishment is one of Pasqal's special abilities, which reduces the damage dealt by the target's attacks for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Targets with the Reject the Flesh feature suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g}. If the target is a mechanism or a machine, this damage is doubled and its characteristics are reduced until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 帕斯卡与和伊迪拉都是技师，但除此之外，帕斯卡还是一位技术祭司。正因如此，他拥有更多选择、优势与独一无二的能力。{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}{/g} 帕斯卡的其中一条机械触须可以让他同时手持技术祭司的双手能量斧与一把{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}武器。您可以在物品栏[{bind|OpenInventory}]界面中，将第二把武器装备到他的机械触须栏位。 机魂交流是帕斯卡的特殊{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，可以减少区域内所有盟友武器的{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}后坐力{/g}，提高武器的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}。同一区域内的所有敌人都会受到相反效果影响。 机魂放逐是帕斯卡的特殊能力，可降低目标所有攻击造成的伤害，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。如果目标具有拒绝实肉特性，此能力还会造成{g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}电击伤害{/g}。如果目标是机械装置或机器，此能力会造成双倍伤害，还会降低目标所有属性，效果持续至战斗结束。

languages.text: パスカルはイディラと同じオペレーターだが、技術司祭の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}メンバーでもあるため、追加のオプション、アドバンテージ、独自の能力が付与されている。 パスカルの機械触手のひとつにより、彼は技術司祭の両手斧と{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔{/g}武器を同時に持つことができる。インベントリ画面[{bind|OpenInventory}]の機械触手スロットにふたつ目の武器を装備しよう。 機械精霊グループはパスカルの特殊{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}。{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}反動{/g}を軽減させ、エリア内にいる味方の武器の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}を強化することができる。同じエリアにいる敵はすべて逆の効果を受ける。 機械精霊バニッシュはパスカルの特殊アビリティのひとつ。ターゲットの攻撃による付与ダメージを1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間軽減する。肉体拒絶の機能を持つターゲットには{g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}ショックダメージ{/g}が付与される。ターゲットがメカニズムや機械の場合、戦闘終了時までこのダメージは2倍になり、その特性は低下する。
languages.original_text: Pasqal is an Operative like Idira, but he is also a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}fellowship{/g} of Tech-Priests, which grants him additional options, advantages, and unique capabilities. One of Pasqal's mechadendrites allows him to hold his two-handed Tech-Priest's axe and a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon at the same time. Equip a second weapon in his mechadendrite slot on the inventory screen [{bind|OpenInventory}]. Machine Spirit Communion is Pasqal's special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} which reduces {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} and boosts {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} of allies' weapons in an area. All enemies in the same area will suffer opposite effects. Machine Spirit Banishment is one of Pasqal's special abilities, which reduces the damage dealt by the target's attacks for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Targets with the Reject the Flesh feature suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g}. If the target is a mechanism or a machine, this damage is doubled and its characteristics are reduced until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: パスカルはイディラと同じアデプトだが、技術司祭の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}メンバーでもあるため、追加のオプション、アドバンテージ、独自の能力が付与されている。 機械触手により、技術司祭の両手斧と{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠隔{/g}武器を同時に持つことができる。インベントリ画面[{bind|OpenInventory}]の機械触手スロットにふたつ目の武器を装備しよう。 機械精霊通信はパスカルの特殊{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}で、{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}反動{/g}を軽減させ、エリア内にいる味方の武器の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}を強化する。同じエリアにいる敵はすべて逆の効果を受ける。 機械精霊バニッシュはパスカルの特殊アビリティのひとつで、ターゲットの攻撃によって与えられるダメージを1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間軽減する。肉体拒絶の機能を持つターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}ショックダメージ{/g}を受ける。ターゲットがメカニズムや機械の場合、戦闘終了時までこのダメージは2倍になり、その特性は低下する。

languages.text: Pasqal es un agente como Idira, pero también forma parte de la hermandad de los tecnosacerdotes. Gracias a ella, disfruta de más opciones, ventajas y cualidades únicas.{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}{/g} Una de las mecadendritasde Pasqal le permite blandir al mismo tiempo su hacha de tecnosacerdote a dos manos y un arma a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distancia{/g}. Equipa una segunda arma en su ranura de mecadendrita en la pantalla de inventario [{bind|OpenInventory}]. Comunión con espíritu máquina es la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} especial de Pasqal. Reduce el {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}retroceso{/g} y potencia la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} de todas las armas de los aliados en un área. Todos los enemigos que estén en la misma área sufrirán efectos contrarios. Destierro de espíritu máquina es una de las capacidades especiales de Pasqal. Reduce el daño que causan los ataques del objetivo durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. Los objetivos con la característica Rechazo cárnico sufren {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}daño de conmoción{/g}. Si el objetivo es un mecanismo o una máquina, se duplica el daño y se reducen sus características hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: Pasqal is an Operative like Idira, but he is also a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}fellowship{/g} of Tech-Priests, which grants him additional options, advantages, and unique capabilities. One of Pasqal's mechadendrites allows him to hold his two-handed Tech-Priest's axe and a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon at the same time. Equip a second weapon in his mechadendrite slot on the inventory screen [{bind|OpenInventory}]. Machine Spirit Communion is Pasqal's special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} which reduces {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} and boosts {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} of allies' weapons in an area. All enemies in the same area will suffer opposite effects. Machine Spirit Banishment is one of Pasqal's special abilities, which reduces the damage dealt by the target's attacks for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Targets with the Reject the Flesh feature suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g}. If the target is a mechanism or a machine, this damage is doubled and its characteristics are reduced until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Pasqal es un adepto como Idira, pero también forma parte de la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}hermandad{/g} de los tecnosacerdotes. Gracias a ella, disfruta de más opciones, ventajas y cualidades únicas. Una de las mecadendritasde Pasqal le permite blandir al mismo tiempo su hacha de tecnosacerdote a dos manos y un arma a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}distancia{/g}. Equipa una segunda arma en su ranura de mecadendrita en la pantalla de inventario [{bind|OpenInventory}]. Comunicación con espíritu máquina es la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} especial de Pasqal. Reduce el {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}retroceso{/g} y potencia la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g} de todas las armas de los aliados en un área. Todos los enemigos que estén en la misma área sufrirán efectos contrarios. Destierro de espíritu máquina es una de las capacidades especiales de Pasqal. Reduce el daño que causan los ataques del objetivo durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ronda{/g}. Los objetivos con la característica Rechazo cárnico sufren {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}daño de conmoción{/g}. Si el objetivo es un mecanismo o una máquina, recibe el doble de daño y sus características se reducen hasta finalizar el combate.

languages.text: Pasqal ist ein Agent wie Idira, aber er ist auch ein Mitglied der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} der Techpriester, was ihm zusätzliche Optionen, Vorteile und einzigartige Fähigkeiten verleiht. Einer von Pasqals Mechadendriten erlaubt ihm, seine zweihändige Techpriester-Axt und eine {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampf{/g}-Waffe gleichzeitig zu führen. Rüste eine zweite Waffe in seinem Mechadendrit-Slot im Inventarbildschirm [{bind|OpenInventory}] aus. Maschinengeist-Kommunion ist Pasqals Spezial-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g}, die den {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}Rückstoß{/g} reduziert und die {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichen-Reduktion{/g} der Waffen von Verbündeten in einem Gebiet erhöht. Alle Feinde im selben Gebiet werden mit entgegengesetzten Effekten belegt. Maschinengeist-Verbannung ist eine von Pasqals Spezialfähigkeiten, die den Schaden der Angriffe des Ziels für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} reduziert. Ziele mit der Eigenschaft Ablehnung des Fleisches erleiden {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}Schockschaden{/g}. Wenn das Ziel ein Mechanismus oder eine Maschine ist, wird dieser Schaden verdoppelt und die Eigenschaften des Ziels werden bis zum Ende des Kampfes reduziert.
languages.original_text: Pasqal is an Operative like Idira, but he is also a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}fellowship{/g} of Tech-Priests, which grants him additional options, advantages, and unique capabilities. One of Pasqal's mechadendrites allows him to hold his two-handed Tech-Priest's axe and a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon at the same time. Equip a second weapon in his mechadendrite slot on the inventory screen [{bind|OpenInventory}]. Machine Spirit Communion is Pasqal's special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} which reduces {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} and boosts {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} of allies' weapons in an area. All enemies in the same area will suffer opposite effects. Machine Spirit Banishment is one of Pasqal's special abilities, which reduces the damage dealt by the target's attacks for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Targets with the Reject the Flesh feature suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g}. If the target is a mechanism or a machine, this damage is doubled and its characteristics are reduced until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Pasqal ist ein Adept wie Idira, aber er ist auch ein Mitglied der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g} der Techpriester, was ihm zusätzliche Optionen, Vorteile und einzigartige Fähigkeiten verleiht. Einer von Pasqals Mechadendriten erlaubt es ihm, seine zweihändige Techpriester-Axt und eine {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Fernkampfwaffe{/g} gleichzeitig zu führen. Rüste eine zweite Waffe in seinem Mechadendrit-Slot im Inventarbildschirm [{bind|OpenInventory}] aus. Maschinengeist-Kommunikation ist Pasqals {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Spezialfähigkeit{/g}, die den {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}Rückstoß{/g} reduziert und die {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichreduktion{/g} der Waffen von Verbündeten in einem Gebiet erhöht. Alle Gegner im selben Gebiet werden mit entgegengesetzten Effekten belegt. Maschinengeist-Bannung ist eine von Pasqals Spezialfähigkeiten, die den Schaden der Angriffe des Ziels für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Zug{/g} reduziert. Ziele mit der Eigenschaft Ablehnung des Fleisches erleiden {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}Schockschaden{/g}. Wenn das Ziel ein Mechanismus oder eine Maschine ist, wird dieser Schaden verdoppelt und die Eigenschaften des Ziels werden bis zum Ende des Kampfes reduziert.

languages.text: À l'instar d'Idira, Pasqal est un agent, mais il est aussi membre de la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}communauté{/g} des technoprêtres, ce qui lui confère des options, avantages et capacités uniques supplémentaires. L'un des mécadendrites de Pasqal lui permet de brandir simultanément sa hache de technoprêtre à deux mains et une {g|Encyclopedia:Range}arme à distance{/g}. Vous pouvez le doter d'une deuxième arme dans son emplacement de mécadendrite sur l'écran d'inventaire [{bind|OpenInventory}]. Pasqal est doté de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} spéciale Communication avec l'esprit de la machine, qui réduit le {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recul{/g} et améliore la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g} des armes des alliés dans une zone donnée. Tous les ennemis situés dans la même zone subissent les effets inverses. Pasqal est également doté de la capacité spéciale Bannissement de l'esprit de la machine, qui réduit les dégâts infligés par les attaques de la cible pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Les cibles dotées de la caractéristique Rejet de la chair subissent des {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}dégâts d'électrocution{/g}. Si la cible est un mécanisme ou une machine, ces dégâts sont doublés et ses caractéristiques sont réduites jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: Pasqal is an Operative like Idira, but he is also a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}fellowship{/g} of Tech-Priests, which grants him additional options, advantages, and unique capabilities. One of Pasqal's mechadendrites allows him to hold his two-handed Tech-Priest's axe and a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon at the same time. Equip a second weapon in his mechadendrite slot on the inventory screen [{bind|OpenInventory}]. Machine Spirit Communion is Pasqal's special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} which reduces {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} and boosts {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} of allies' weapons in an area. All enemies in the same area will suffer opposite effects. Machine Spirit Banishment is one of Pasqal's special abilities, which reduces the damage dealt by the target's attacks for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Targets with the Reject the Flesh feature suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g}. If the target is a mechanism or a machine, this damage is doubled and its characteristics are reduced until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: À l'instar d'Idira, Pasqal est un Adepte, mais il est aussi membre de la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}communauté{/g} des Technoprêtres, ce qui lui confère des options, avantages et capacités uniques supplémentaires. L'un des mécadendrites de Pasqal lui permet de brandir simultanément sa hache de Technoprêtre à deux mains et une arme {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g}. Vous pouvez le doter d'une deuxième arme dans son emplacement de mécadendrite sur l'écran d'inventaire [{bind|OpenInventory}]. Pasqal est doté de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} spéciale Communication avec l'Esprit des Machines, qui réduit le {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recul{/g} et améliore la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g} des armes des alliés dans une zone donnée. Tous les ennemis situés dans la même zone subissent les effets inverses. Pasqal est également doté de la capacité spéciale Bannissement de l'Esprit de la Machine, qui réduit les dégâts infligés par les attaques de la cible pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Les cibles dotées de la caractéristique Rejet de la Chair subissent des {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}dégâts d'électrocution{/g}. Si la cible est un mécanisme ou une machine, ces dégâts sont doublés et ses caractéristiques sont réduites jusqu'à la fin du combat.

À l'instar d'Idira, Pasqal est un Adepte, mais il est aussi membre de la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}communauté{/g} des Technoprêtres, ce qui lui confère des options, avantages et capacités uniques supplémentaires. L'un des mécadendrites de Pasqal lui permet de brandir simultanément sa hache de Technoprêtre à deux mains et une arme {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g}. Vous pouvez le doter d'une deuxième arme dans son emplacement de mécadendrite sur l'écran d'inventaire [{bind|OpenInventory}]. Pasqal est doté de la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} spéciale Communication avec l'Esprit des Machines, qui réduit le {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recul{/g} et améliore la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g} des armes des alliés dans une zone donnée. Tous les ennemis situés dans la même zone subissent les effets inverses. Pasqal est également doté de la capacité spéciale Bannissement de l'Esprit de la Machine, qui réduit les dégâts infligés par les attaques de la cible pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Les cibles dotées de la caractéristique Rejet de la Chair subissent des {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}dégâts d'électrocution{/g}. Si la cible est un mécanisme ou une machine, ces dégâts sont doublés et ses caractéristiques sont réduites jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: Pasqal da İdira gibi Ajan'dır ancak aynı zamanda Tekno Rahip kardeşliğine mensuptur. Bu da ona ek seçenekler, avantajlar ve benzersiz yetiler sunar. Pasqal, mekadentritlerinden biri sayesinde, ellerinde aynı anda hem çift el Tekno Rahip baltasını hem de {g|Encyclopedia:Range}menzilli{/g} bir silah tutabilir. Envanter ekranındaki [{bind|OpenInventory}] mekadentrit yuvasına ikinci bir silah yerleştir. Makine Ruhlarına Hitabet belirli bir alandaki dost birimlerin silahlarının {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}geri tepmesini{/g} azaltırken {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}kaçınma azaltımı{/g} değerlerini artıran, Pasqal'ın özel {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyetlerindendir{/g}. Aynı alandaki tüm düşmanlar ise tam tersi etkilere maruz kalırlar. Makine Ruhu Kovma hedefin saldırılarının vereceği hasarı azaltan ve etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} süren, Pasqal'ın özel kabiliyetlerinden biridir. Etten Kurtul özelliğine sahip hedefler {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}şok hasarına{/g} maruz kalırlar. Karakter bir mekanizma veya makine ise bu hasar ikiye katlanır ve karakterin nitelikleri azalır. Azalma etkisi çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text: Pasqal is an Operative like Idira, but he is also a member of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}fellowship{/g} of Tech-Priests, which grants him additional options, advantages, and unique capabilities. One of Pasqal's mechadendrites allows him to hold his two-handed Tech-Priest's axe and a {g|Encyclopedia:Range}ranged{/g} weapon at the same time. Equip a second weapon in his mechadendrite slot on the inventory screen [{bind|OpenInventory}]. Machine Spirit Communion is Pasqal's special {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} which reduces {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} and boosts {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} of allies' weapons in an area. All enemies in the same area will suffer opposite effects. Machine Spirit Banishment is one of Pasqal's special abilities, which reduces the damage dealt by the target's attacks for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. Targets with the Reject the Flesh feature suffer {g|Encyclopedia:ShockDamage}shock damage{/g}. If the target is a mechanism or a machine, this damage is doubled and its characteristics are reduced until the end of combat.
